name: Watermelon Suika Game
description: Get ready to be enchanted by this lovely fruit game! Your mission? Create the legendary Watermelon, the most challenging fruit of all! Climb the leaderboard, reach the top, and prove to be the best in this thrilling challenge! Despite its simplicity, this game holds surprises and epic challenges. Explore the relaxing fun of this game that hides an equally engaging and challenging experience!
